title: A Bleak Report Card for America's Schools
description:
The National Assessment of Educational Progress announced the sharpest decline in math and reading test scores ever for fourth- and eighth-grade students.  Is this another sign of the damage done by lockdowns, and how will this grim news play in the midterm elections? Plus, the U.K. has its third prime minister this year, as Rishi Sunak takes over after Liz Truss and Boris Johnson. 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Paul Gigot, The Wall Street Journal
